fn.p: Edited by: Karl Ljungberg, Eurocine Vaccines AB, Sweden

Reviewed by: William Messer, Oregon Health and Science University, United States; Mariano Esteban, Centro Nacional de Biotecnología (CNB), Spain; Ada Maria De Barcelos Alves, Oswaldo Cruz Foundation (Fiocruz), Brazil
